short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make fullscreen the green app. Expand the area of it chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to work with the green web app to make it "full screen".
The idea is to expand the chat area of this web app in big monitors.

In big monitors this web app shows the chat in a small square not using the entire screen.
This extension expand that small square and use the entire monitor area.

Changelog:
* 1.0.0 - Extension created.
* 1.0.1 - Small update to fix the new styles of the green web app.
